com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.extraction.documents.block

Interface BlockDocument<PositionInDocument>

  • Type Parameters:
    PositionInDocument - The position in the original document. This may be the XML-node in XML-documents or the offset in plain text documents.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Document, DocumentPartMapping<PositionInDocument>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockDocumentImpl

    public interface BlockDocument<PositionInDocument>
extends Document, DocumentPartMapping<PositionInDocument>
    The BlockDocument is an easy way to implement client side segmentation and back mapping chunks of text back to positions in original documents.
